jesterMod:OblivionStrike.NAME: OblivionStrike
jesterMod:OblivionStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, deal !D! damage again.

jesterMod:DancingMad.NAME: Dancing Mad
jesterMod:DancingMad.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL jestermod:Elusive.
jesterMod:DancingMad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.

jesterMod:FlameDance.NAME: Flame Dance
jesterMod:FlameDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

jesterMod:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
jesterMod:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Whenever you play a skill, Gain !M! temporary Dexterity.
jesterMod:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Whenever you play a skill, Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Innate.

jesterMod:Contradiction.NAME: Contradiction
jesterMod:Contradiction.DESCRIPTION: Whenever Weak, Vulnerable or Frail is applied to you, gain !M! Strength.
jesterMod:Contradiction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever Weak, Vulnerable or Frail is applied to you, gain !M! Strength. NL Innate.

jesterMod:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
jesterMod:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to every monster. NL Gain 1 Weak.

jesterMod:BoilDown.NAME: Boil Down
jesterMod:BoilDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal obtain a random potion.

jesterMod:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
jesterMod:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
jesterMod:Tinker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

jesterMod:Discretion.NAME: Discretion
jesterMod:Discretion.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust
jesterMod:Discretion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

jesterMod:SwiftDodge.NAME: Swift Dodge
jesterMod:SwiftDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

jesterMod:Prank.NAME: Prank
jesterMod:Prank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: jestermod:Recycle !M!. NL Exhaust. NL jestermod:Bouncing, Retain.

jesterMod:Prankster.NAME: Prankster
jesterMod:Prankster.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Prank to your hand each turn.
jesterMod:Prankster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Prank to your hand each turn. NL Innate.

jesterMod:Haste.NAME: Haste
jesterMod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards.
jesterMod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards. NL jestermod:Elusive.

jesterMod:Flee.NAME: Flee
jesterMod:Flee.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block.
jesterMod:Flee.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable, jestermod:Bouncing. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block.

jesterMod:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
jesterMod:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

jesterMod:Dilapidation.NAME: Dilapidation
jesterMod:Dilapidation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard all cards in your hand.

jesterMod:JackInTheBox.NAME: Jack In The Box
jesterMod:JackInTheBox.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Prank to your draw pile.

jesterMod:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
jesterMod:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Deal yourself damage equal to the enemy's current HP. NL Reduce the enemy's HP to 0.

jesterMod:Drunkenness.NAME: Drunkenness
jesterMod:Drunkenness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! to !jesterMod:SecondMagic! Strength and !M! to !jesterMod:SecondMagic! Dexterity.
jesterMod:Drunkenness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! to !jesterMod:SecondMagic! Strength and !M! to !jesterMod:SecondMagic! Dexterity. NL Innate.

jesterMod:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
jesterMod:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 *Plated *Armor.

jesterMod:MudBall.NAME: Mud Ball
jesterMod:MudBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Slimed to your draw pile.

jesterMod:Patience.NAME: Patience
jesterMod:Patience.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] and draw !M! cards next turn.

jesterMod:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
jesterMod:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies when drawn. NL Ethereal.

jesterMod:LightTheWick.NAME: Light the Wick
jesterMod:LightTheWick.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Detonate to your discard pile.
jesterMod:LightTheWick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Detonate to your draw pile.

jesterMod:Talion.NAME: Talion
jesterMod:Talion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy for each time you lost HP this combat.

jesterMod:Frustration.NAME: Frustration
jesterMod:Frustration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Only playable if you are Frail, Vulnerable or Weak.

jesterMod:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
jesterMod:Inspiration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [E] when drawn. NL jestermod:Elusive.

jesterMod:Hide.NAME: Hide
jesterMod:Hide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Replace this card with a *Seek.
jesterMod:Hide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Replace this card with a *Seek+.

jesterMod:Seek.NAME: Seek
jesterMod:Seek.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Replace this card with a *Hide.
jesterMod:Seek.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Replace this card with a *Hide+.

jesterMod:Twirl.NAME: Twirl
jesterMod:Twirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are Vulnerable, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

jesterMod:JugglerBlade.NAME: Juggler blade
jesterMod:JugglerBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded this turn.

jesterMod:Procrastination.NAME: Procrastination
jesterMod:Procrastination.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw that many cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:Juggle.NAME: Juggle
jesterMod:Juggle.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add that many *Juggling *Balls to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:Juggle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add that many *Juggling *Balls+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:JugglingBall.NAME: Juggling Ball
jesterMod:JugglingBall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL jestermod:Bouncing, Ethereal. NL When this card is Discarded or Exhausted, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

jesterMod:Pause.NAME: Pause
jesterMod:Pause.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:Pause.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:DanceOfChaos.NAME: Dance of Chaos
jesterMod:DanceOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:DanceOfChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards from your draw pile.

jesterMod:ButterflyDance.NAME: Butterfly Dance
jesterMod:ButterflyDance.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X random attacks, skills AND powers into your draw pile. They cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:ButterflyDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle X random attacks, skills AND powers into your draw pile. They cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
jesterMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card for each card discarded this turn

jesterMod:Trance.NAME: Trance
jesterMod:Trance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard the top card from your draw pile, if this is a skill card, play *Trance again.

jesterMod:Precipitation.NAME: Precipitation
jesterMod:Precipitation.DESCRIPTION: When you shuffle your draw pile, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

jesterMod:HitAndRun.NAME: Hit & Run
jesterMod:HitAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block at the start of your next turn.

jesterMod:QuickStrike.NAME: Quick Strike
jesterMod:QuickStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card at the start of your next turn.

jesterMod:Juggler.NAME: Juggler
jesterMod:Juggler.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, add a *Juggling *Ball to your hand.

jesterMod:Arrythmia.NAME: Arrythmia
jesterMod:Arrythmia.DESCRIPTION: Alternatively gain [E] [E] or lose [E] at the start of your turn.
jesterMod:Arrythmia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Alternatively gain [E] [E] or lose [E] at the start of your turn. NL Innate.

jesterMod:Pillage.NAME: Pillage
jesterMod:Pillage.DESCRIPTION: Choose a *Feed, *Lesson *Learned, *Boil *Down or *Hand *of *Greed to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:Pillage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a *Feed, *Lesson *Learned, *Boil *Down or *Hand *of *Greed to add to your hand. NL Exhaust, Retain.

jesterMod:Schizophrenia.NAME: Schizophrenia
jesterMod:Schizophrenia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose a [#9e2a30]red[], [#478036]green[], [#296187]blue[] or [#59367d]purple[] card to add to your hand.

jesterMod:Disposophobia.NAME: Disposophobia
jesterMod:Disposophobia.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, deal !M! damage to this enemy. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:Disposophobia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:HedgehogForm.NAME: Hedgehog Form
jesterMod:HedgehogForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! thorns.

jesterMod:Finale.NAME: Finale
jesterMod:Finale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You cannot gain block from cards for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

jesterMod:Squander.NAME: Squander
jesterMod:Squander.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards from your draw pile.

jesterMod:Encore.NAME: Encore
jesterMod:Encore.DESCRIPTION: Replays the previous card. NL Exhaust.
jesterMod:Encore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replays the previous card. NL Exhaust, jestermod:Bouncing.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played any card yet.
I'm afraid this is a bad idea.

jesterMod:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
jesterMod:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to every monster. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

jesterMod:Exasperation.NAME: Exasperation
jesterMod:Exasperation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever Weak, Vulnerable or Frail is applied to you, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

jesterMod:Mending.NAME: Mending
jesterMod:Mending.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, gain !M! Block.
jesterMod:Mending.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, gain !M! Block. NL Innate.

jesterMod:Hopeless.NAME: Hopeless
jesterMod:Hopeless.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 Weakened. NL Ethereal.

jesterMod:DesperateStrike.NAME: Desperate Strike
jesterMod:DesperateStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Hopeless to your hand. NL jestermod:Recycle 1.

jesterMod:SelfMockery.NAME: Self-Mockery
jesterMod:SelfMockery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Prank to your draw pile.

jesterMod:Rebuff.NAME: Rebuff
jesterMod:Rebuff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are Weakened, deal !D! damage again.

jesterMod:ExperimentalTreatment.NAME: Experimental Treatment
jesterMod:ExperimentalTreatment.DESCRIPTION: Remove any Weak, Frail and Vulnerable you have. NL Gain as many HP. NL jestermod:Buried, Exhaust.

jesterMod:BouncingKnife.NAME: Bouncing Knife
jesterMod:BouncingKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When discarded, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL jestermod:Bouncing.

jesterMod:PerfectDodge.NAME: Perfect Dodge
jesterMod:PerfectDodge.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL You cannot gain block from cards until the end of your next turn.

jesterMod:LaughingGas.NAME: Laughing Gas
jesterMod:LaughingGas.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Strength to ALL enemies. NL jestermod:Buried, jestermod:Elusive.
